title: Dev Log #1
text:
Hello everyone!

This is the first update on Spark. We have been working on this project in our free time during the last few months and I have to say, things are coming along pretty great. The landing page, as well as the join page and lobby page are nearing their final look and are already close to finished when it comes to functionality. Cards have gotten a complete design overhaul as well as animations. Especially for special effects cards.

You can find some screenshots of the development-build down below. Keep in mind that these could change a bit before the final release.

'Till next time,
~ emilio.mini
